channel.title: Query
channel.description: Query is like that one smart nerd in your family who gets stuck fixing everyone's computers and phones during holiday get-togethers. There's no reason to wait for help when tech goes wrong when there are experts ready to answer your questions. Submit questions by tweeting with the hashtag #askquery. Hosted by Stephen Hackett and Mikah Sargent.
channel.itunes:author: Relay FM

item.title: 2: A Tiny Little Guilty Knot
item.description: iCloud Photo Library can have a serious impact on your backup strategy, as Matthew, Dave and Ryan have learned. After trying to clear up the cloud service's various modes, Ren and Stephen talk about task managers, help Alex pick out a drawing app for the iPad, and discuss gaming PCs.
item.itunes:title: A Tiny Little Guilty Knot
item.itunes:author: Serenity Caldwell and Stephen Hackett
item.itunes:subtitle: iCloud Photo Library can have a serious impact on your backup strategy, as Matthew, Dave and Ryan have learned. Then, Ren and Stephen talk about task managers, help Alex pick out a drawing app for the iPad, and discuss gaming PCs.
item.itunes:summary: iCloud Photo Library can have a serious impact on your backup strategy, as Matthew, Dave and Ryan have learned. Then, Ren and Stephen talk about task managers, help Alex pick out a drawing app for the iPad, and discuss gaming PCs.
item.content:encoded:
iCloud Photo Library can have a serious impact on your backup strategy, as Matthew, Dave and Ryan have learned. After trying to clear up the cloud service's various modes, Ren and Stephen talk about task managers, help Alex pick out a drawing app for the iPad, and discuss gaming PCs.

Links and Show Notes:

iCloud Photo Library - Apple Support

Cloud Photo Library automatically keeps every photo and video you take in iCloud, so you can access your library from any device, anytime you want. Any changes you make to your collection on one device, change on your other devices too.

To do list and task manager. Free, easy, online and mobile: Todoist

With apps and extensions for 10 platforms, your tasks are always there: on mobile devices, web browsers, inboxes, and more.

The best apps. Better together. - Zapier

Zapier connects web apps, allowing powerful automation to take place online.

Reminders App: The Ultimate Guide | iMore

While Reminders will never replace a sophisticated "getting things done" app, it is a pretty great "getting started" app for those new to to-dos.

PCalc - The Best Calculator on the App Store

PCalc is the powerful choice for scientists, engineers, students, programmers, or indeed anybody looking for a feature rich calculator.

Calcbot â€” The Intelligent Calculator and Unit Converter on the App Store

Calcbot is an intelligent calculator and unit converter for the rest of us. Featuring an easy-to-read history tape, expression view, intuitive conversion, and much more!

Soulver - the notepad calculator on the App Store

Soulver is a revolutionary calculator replacement app. Its powerful UI lets you do calculations over multiple lines, and use can also use words alongside numbers, so that they make sense.

Paper by FiftyThree - Sketch, Diagram, Take Notes on the App Store

When inspiration happens, put it on Paper. Paper is the best way to capture and connect your notes, photos, and sketches. Create checklists, spotlight details in photos, and sketch diagrams with unbeatable speed and ease â€” Paper is like a wall of sticky notes for everything that inspires you.

Linea - Sketch Simply on the App Store

Modern drawing apps are powerful, but they can overload you with hundreds of choices. Constant adjustments to brushes, colors, and layers wastes time and adds friction. Linea takes a different approach and gives you just the right balance of power and control to sketch effortlessly. The focus stays where it belongs: on your ideas, not the tools.

An animated review of Linea, my new favorite sketching app | iMore

Ren's review of Linea, the Iconfactory's new app for sketching, writing, and idea-building.

Procreate â€“ Sketch, paint, create. on the App Store

Apple Design Award winner and App Store Essential â€“ Procreate is the most powerful sketching, painting and illustration app ever designed for a mobile device.

Boot Camp - Apple Support

Boot Camp comes with your Mac and lets you install Microsoft Windows. No need to download anything yourself â€” just open Boot Camp Assistant and it will guide you through the rest.

Corsair One review: a console-like PC in the age of PC-like consoles - The Verge

The Corsair One is the gaming rig for those of us tired of or uninterested in being responsible for every little component that goes into their machine. Itâ€™s the "it just works" gaming PC, with all the maxed-out specs gamers demand enclosed in a sober exterior that their housemates and loved ones can tolerate.

Best Desktop PC For VR | VRHeads

This buyer's guide walks through the best PC VR experiences for consumers.

item.title: 1: Kbase Diving
item.description: This week, Serenity and Stephen help Tyler with some personal hotspot concerns and share their excitement over iOS 11's features. Then, they tackle Mac backups for Richard, help Doug make a cinemagraph and pick out an iOS device for Daniel.
item.itunes:title: Kbase Diving
item.itunes:author: Serenity Caldwell and Stephen Hackett
item.itunes:subtitle: This week, Serenity and Stephen help Tyler with some personal hotspot concerns and share their excitement over iOS 11's features. Then, they tackle Mac backups for Richard, help Doug make a cinemagraph and pick out an iOS device for Daniel.
item.itunes:summary: This week, Serenity and Stephen help Tyler with some personal hotspot concerns and share their excitement over iOS 11's features. Then, they tackle Mac backups for Richard, help Doug make a cinemagraph and pick out an iOS device for Daniel.
item.content:encoded:
This week, Serenity and Stephen help Tyler with some personal hotspot concerns and share their excitement over iOS 11's features. Then, they tackle Mac backups for Richard, help Doug make a cinemagraph and pick out an iOS device for Daniel.

Links and Show Notes:

Membership - Relay FM

Support shows like Query!

Kbase of the Week - 512 Pixels

Stephen really likes Apple's support website.

Share your Internet connection with Personal Hotspot - Apple Support

Certain apps and features that require a Wi-Fi connection might not work while using a Personal Hotspot. For example, you might not be able to make an iCloud backup or upload photos to iCloud Photo Library or Photo Stream.
